amendment.description: To provide employee protections for the Commissioned Corps of the Public Health Service Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2121 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2121 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S3491-3492, S3507; text: CR S3491) To provide employee protections for the Commissioned Corps of the Public Health Service Act.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2121 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2121 proposed by Senator Grassley.
